Key Match Events: Youri Tielemans scored twice for Belgium in the first half
Ivan Toney scored a penalty for England in the first half
Jude Bellingham scored the equalizing goal for England in the 95th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Jude Bellingham praised Kobbie Mainoo's performance
Ivan Toney expressed his hope of making an impression
Miscellaneous Highlights: England dominated the second half but struggled with their final product
The game was played on a heavy, damp pitch
Others: The game was played at Wembley
Gareth Southgate's focus is now on selecting his squad for Euro 2024
